macro.name: TPAR_FILE
macro.description: TPAR file name in directory C:\\Instrument\\Settings. 40 Character maximum.

macro.name: BOOSTER_TPAR_FILE
macro.description: Booster heater TPAR file name in directory C:\\Instrument\\Settings. 40 Character maximum.

macro.name: EDITOR_TPAR_FILE_DIR
macro.description: Directory where TPAR editor files are stored. 512 chars max
